languages.text: If there are allies in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of the Soldier's area attack, enemies in the area suffer a −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against that attack.
languages.original_text: Если в зоне поражения {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаки по области{/g} находятся союзники солдата, то противники в этой зоне получают штрафы −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} во время этой атаки.

traits.locale_text: If there are allies in the area of the Marksman's area attack, enemies in the area suffer a -<u>(10+5×(BS bonus))%</u> penalty to dodge and a -<u>(10+2×(BS bonus))%</u> penalty to armour against that attack.

If there are allies in the area of the Marksman's area attack, enemies in the area suffer a −<u>(10 + 5 × BS bonus)</u>% penalty to dodge and a −<u>(10 + 2 × BS bonus)</u>% penalty to armour against that attack.

If there are allies in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of the Soldier's area attack, enemies in the area suffer a −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against that attack.

If there are allies in the area of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of the Marksman's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, enemies in the area suffer a −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} and a −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against that attack.

If there are allies in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of the Soldier's area attack, enemies in the area suffer a −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against that attack.

languages.text: 如果士兵的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}的效果区域内存在盟友，则该区域内所有敌人在对抗此次攻击时，{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}降低{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}%，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}%。
languages.original_text: If there are allies in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of the Soldier's area attack, enemies in the area suffer a −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against that attack.

traits.locale_text: 如果神射手的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}的效果区域内存在盟友，则该区域内所有敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}承受<u>（10+5×弹道技能{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}承受<u>（10+2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}加值）</u>%减值。

如果神射手的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}的效果区域内存在盟友，则该区域内所有敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}承受{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}%{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}承受{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}%减值。

languages.text: Si hay aliados en el {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área de efecto{/g} del ataque de área del soldado, los enemigos presentes en esa zona sufren una penalización del −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502} % a la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y una penalización del −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502} % a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} contra ese ataque.
languages.original_text: If there are allies in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of the Soldier's area attack, enemies in the area suffer a −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against that attack.

traits.locale_text: Si hay aliados en el {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área de efecto{/g} del ataque de área del tirador de élite, los enemigos presentes en esa zona sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} del −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502} % a la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y una penalización del −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502} % a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} contra ese ataque.

Si hay aliados en el área de efecto del {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} del tirador de élite, los enemigos presentes en esa zona sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} del −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502} % a la {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} y una penalización del −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502} % a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} contra ese ataque.

languages.text: Wenn es Verbündete im {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Wirkungsbereich{/g} eines Flächenangriffs des Soldaten gibt, erleiden dortige Feinde einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502} % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und einen Abzug von −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502} % auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} gegen diesen Angriff.
languages.original_text: If there are allies in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of the Soldier's area attack, enemies in the area suffer a −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against that attack.

traits.locale_text: Wenn es Verbündete im Effektbereich eines {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffs{/g} des Scharfschützen gibt, erleiden dortige Feinde einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502} % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und einen Abzug von −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502} % auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} gegen diesen Angriff.

Wenn es Verbündete im Effektbereich eines {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffs{/g} des Scharfschützen gibt, erleiden dortige Feinde einen −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502} %-{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} und einen −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502} %-Abzug auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} gegen diesen Angriff.

languages.text: Si des alliés se trouvent dans la {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}zone d'effet{/g} de l'attaque de zone du soldat, des pénalités de −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502} % et −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502} % s'appliquent respectivement à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} des ennemis présents dans cette zone au moment de l'attaque.
languages.original_text: If there are allies in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of the Soldier's area attack, enemies in the area suffer a −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against that attack.

traits.locale_text: Si des alliés se trouvent dans la zone d'effet de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} du Tireur d'Élite, des {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalités{/g} de -<u>(10 + 5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de CB)</u> % et -<u>(10 + 2 × bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}CB{/g})</u> % s'appliquent respectivement à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} des ennemis présents dans cette zone au moment de l'attaque.

Si des alliés se trouvent dans la zone d'effet de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} du Tireur d'Élite, des {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalités{/g} de -{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502} % et -{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502} % s'appliquent respectivement à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} des ennemis présents dans cette zone au moment de l'attaque.

languages.text: 兵士の{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}の範囲内に味方がいる場合、範囲内の敵はその攻撃に対する{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}に−{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}と、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}に{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}%のペナルティを受ける。
languages.original_text: If there are allies in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of the Soldier's area attack, enemies in the area suffer a −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against that attack.

traits.locale_text: マークスマンの{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}の範囲内に味方がいる場合、範囲内の敵はその攻撃に対する{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}に−<u>(10 + 5 × BS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}と、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}に<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}ボーナス)</u>%のペナルティを受ける。

マークスマンの{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}の範囲内に味方がいる場合、範囲内の敵はその攻撃に対する{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}に−{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}と、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}に{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}%のペナルティを受ける。

languages.text: Если в зоне поражения {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаки по области{/g} находятся союзники солдата, то противники в этой зоне получают штрафы −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} во время этой атаки.
languages.original_text: If there are allies in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of the Soldier's area attack, enemies in the area suffer a −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against that attack.
